812000.name: Sorcerer's Path Artbook
812000.description:
The official Art Book of Sorcerer's Path! This Art Book tells the story of the production of the game's art, from humble beginnings of blocks and squares of programmer art!

Concept Art!


See the enemies, bosses, and environments of the game? Well they came from something and this book shows the gorgeous process of how these came to be!

A Short Story of the Production!


We aren't just slapping art together into a book! This book tells the actual art production of this game! All the ups and downs and the art that came out of each peak! All in a style of a book!

If you're a huge fan of seeing all kinds of fun concept art and enjoy this game, get this fun little book here!
